actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to require the Bureau of Prisons to notify local law enforcement agencies of the release of Federal prisoners.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to require the Bureau of Prisons, at least five days prior to the release of a Federal prisoner convicted of a drug trafficking crime or crime of violence on supervised release (or at least five days prior to the date on which a prisoner on supervised release changes residence to a new jurisdiction), to so notify the chief law enforcement officer of the State and local jurisdiction in which the prisoner will reside.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to require the Bureau of Prisons to notify local law enforcement agencies of the release of Federal prisoners.
